commit_list.message:
[major refactor] Separate workflow steps into methods;  attmept to clarify boundaries.  Prep for standardizing workflow steps into thennables. (#180)

REMOVES decorateRequest, ADDS decorateReqOpt and decorateReqBody.   This paves the way for pluggable bodyContent handlers, which has been a theme recently.

commit_list.message:
[#104] Fix: Exceptions parsing proxied response causes error: Can't set headers after they are sent. (#111)

Do not swallow real (e.g. parsing) issue by covering it up with a Can't set headers error.
commit_list.repo_description: Proxy middleware for Koa. Based on villadora/express-http-proxy

commit_list.message:
Forward path async.rebased (#110)

* Introduced options.forwardPathAsync, to support scenarios where the determination of forward path needs to be asynchronous code.

* A few minor tweaks to forwardPathAsync code.

* Add a test:debug task.

commit_list.message:
Dev tweaks (#62)

* [adhoc] Add contributor, separate mocha and lint so mocha can be run on unlinted code (specifically, debugger)

* Add .jshintrc;  fixes issue where jshint was using a system level .jshintrc because it didn't find one in the project.
